name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of journalism, including concepts of accuracy, objectivity, fairness, balance, and ethical considerations.

name: Journalism Writing
description: This course covers the basics of news writing and reportage, including topics such as writing techniques, story structure, and interviewing.

name: Media Law
description: This course covers the legal issues related to journalism, such as libel, copyright, privacy, and access to information.

name: Visual Journalism
description: This course explores the use of visual media in journalism, such as photography, video, and infographics.

name: Photojournalism
description: This course covers the principles and techniques of photojournalism, from shooting to post-processing.
